ygData.authorName: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)
ygData.from: "Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: Rangers got told they wouldn t get improvements to defensive skills on numerous occasions.  Case closed end of discussion.  Ranger rants continued on Whineplay
ygData.messageBody:
Rangers got told they wouldn't get improvements to defensive skills on
numerous occasions. Case closed end of discussion. Ranger rants continued
on Whineplay anyway. Verant has since backed down on that decision. So it
wasn't a waste of their time because they got what they wanted in the end.
Bards could be in a similar situation if we continue to raise the issues on
Whineplay. Question is does anyone feel like fighting the battle anymore.
The mood I'm getting is that a lot of bards are saying screw it and either
switching classes or quitting the game.

Galtin of E'ci



why isn't working as intended a valid response? that's like going to an
amusement park, riding a roller coaster and saying, well my idea of a roller
coaster is different, it should have 2 more corkscrews and a loop and
expecting
the amusement park to reconstruct it to match your specifications. if you
don't like it, ride another ride (try another class) or if you really don't
like it,
don't go to the park anymore (cancel your account). but either way, it's a
waste
of time and energy to keep ranting about it afterwards.


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
